title: Can someone please identify this font?
content:
Can someone please identify this font?  
thank you!!!!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-06-06 at 2.37.18 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015912/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-06-06%20at%202.37.18%20PM.png) | 83.73 KB |
author: minnocent

comments.content:
Designer, or font-maker, seems to have made it from Hoefler's Didot M-96 or something very similar and snipped off the serifs.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DidotHTF-M96_3464.jpg)
  
 [Didot at H&FJ](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015912/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100004)

Don
